article:
: For the term'attacker' in computer security, see [[Hacker (computer
: security)]], [[Adversary (cryptography)]] and [[Adversary (online
: algorithm)]].

In some sports, an 'attacker' is a specific type of player, usually one whose
role involves aggressive play. Heavy attackers are usually placed up front so
they can score some points for the team.

In football, attackers are also referred to as strikers.
